article:
'Den' (, The Day) is a Kiev-based, centrist daily boardsheet newspaper. Founded
in 1996, the paper has a circulation of about 60,000. It is linked to former
prime minister Yevhen Marchuk - his wife Larysa Ivshyna is the paper's editor-in-
chief. Den has been supporting Leonid Kuchma, NATO, and ties with the West.

The paper is also notable by its annual photography contest, being the main
photo event in Ukraine.

Den is a member of UAPP.
